title: Transfer token
body:
When will we get free transfer tokens ?
I rly want to go back to eune.

replies.body: I don't have any info on free transfers.  It's been pretty rare and usually tied to big server changes, like a new server.  Your best bet would be to bookmark the [Sales](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales) page in case anything does come up.  I hope that helps!
